resources.string: Myself sachin patel, graduated B.Tech from Gujarat Technological University(GTU) as an IT Engineer. I am blessed with very good imagination power and creativity. Me as a student, Completed many small tasks, joined Braintec labs pvt. ltd. as an Intern. After study, Joined Imagine Technology. I have 2 years experience of corporate world. Because of my interest and love for Android technology, I want to make my further career as an Android developer.
